full-pick-text: The new Capture button: Supports at least two user-configurable gestures, Will support third-party camera apps in addition to the system camera, Will integrate with the Controls API to configure various commands
notes:
• "Supports at least two user-configurable gestures"
  • "Will support third-party camera apps in addition to the system camera"
  • "Will integrate with the Controls API to configure various commands"
